item.title: About Me
item.description: היי תוכן בעברית I am a Full Stack Developer with experience in various technologies such as TypeScript, Vue.js, Node.js, GCP, Docker, SQL, Ember.js, Ruby on Rails, Go, AWS, PostgreSQL, Java, Android, Scala, Play, and MongoDB. I have a strong background in both frontend and backend development, with a particular interest in backend logic and API design. I am currently a Software Engineer at Riskified and have previously worked at Snyk, Tailor Brands and Hello Heart Mobile.
